alert.note: Alert for Durham; Franklin; Granville; Orange; Person; Vance; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Person, southwestern Vance, northeastern Orange, southern Granville, north central Wake, northern Durham and northwestern Franklin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oxford to 6 miles northeast of Butner to Rougemont. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Creedmoor, Butner, Franklinton, Kittrell, Rougemont, Stem, Lake Michie, Falls Lake State Rec Area, Gorman and Bahama. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Durham; Franklin; Granville; Orange; Person; Vance; Wake
